ygData.subject: Re: enchanter q.
ygData.msgSnippet: Definitely worthwhile and fun. I can do plenty solo, in fact I definitely gain xp and cash faster solo, plus I am great in a group. Just not a good class for
ygData.messageBody:
Definitely worthwhile and fun. I can do plenty solo, in fact I definitely
gain xp and cash faster solo, plus I am great in a group. Just not a good
class for powergamers, because honestly, you will never be as strong as a
wizard of the same level.
-Sloop, Level 12 Human Enchanter
Fennin Ro
----- Original Message -----
From: <Kubleais@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 29, 1999 2:21 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] enchanter q.


> From: Kubleais@...
>
> I'm not in EQ yet, but I'm seriously considering it. Main question I have
is
> whether it's really worthwhile/fun/possible to play the enchanter class
solo?
> Stuff I've read so far kinda says that if you're not in a group, you're
not
> goin anywhere...
>
